text: Park Jae-Sang (; born December 31, 1977) is a South Korean singer-songwriter, rapper and record producer. He is mainly known by his stage name, PSY (). His 2012 single "Gangnam Style" was a surprise viral video. Before its popularity he was little known outside South Korea. Psy performed "Gangnam Style" on the American show Saturday Night Live. ==Discography== ===Albums=== Title Album details PSY from the PSYcho World! * Released: 2001 * Label: * Format: CD Sa 2/Adult only * Released: 2002 * Label: * Format: CD 3 PSY * Released: 2002 * Label: * Format: CD Sa Jib (Sa House) * Released: 2006 * Label: * Format: CD PSY Five * Released: 2010 * Label: YG Entertainment * Format: CD PSY's Best 6th Part 1 * Released: July 25, 2012 * Label: YG Entertainment * Format: CD, Download Chiljip PSY-da * Released: 2015 * Label: * Format: CD, Download 4x2=8 * Released: 2017 * Label: * Format: CD, Download PSY 9th * Released: 2022 * Label: * Format: CD, Download ===Singles=== Year Single Peak chart positions Album KOR AUS CAN DEN NL NZ UK US 2000 "Bird" — — — — — — — — 2002 "Singosik" — — — — — — — — "Bird 2" (featuring Kim Hyun-Juk) — — — — — — — — "Champion" — — — — — — — — "Paradise" (featuring Lee Jae-Hoon) — — — — — — — — 2006 "Artists" — — — — — — — — "2 Beautiful Goodbyes" (featuring Lee Jae-Hoon) — — — — — — — — "We Are the One" — — — — — — — — "Calling You Because It's Raining" — — — — — — — — 2010 "RIGHT NOW" — — — — — — — — "In My Eyes" (featuring Lee Jae-Hoon) — — — — — — — — "THANK YOU" (featuring Seo In-Young) — — — — — — — — 2011 "It's Art" — — — — — — — — 2012 "Gangnam Style" 1 1 1 1 2 1 1 2 PSY's Best 6th Part 1 "Oppa Is Just My Style" — — — — — — — — 2013 "Gentleman" – – – – – – – – "—" denotes a title that did not chart, or was not released in that territory. == Other websites == * Category:1977 births Category:Hip hop singers Category:K-pop singers Category:Living people Category:South Korean record producers Category:Singers from Seoul Category:South Korean rappers Category:South Korean singer- songwriters Category:YG Entertainment artists
